ISSUE.TITLE: Arabic language does not save numerical fields
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40.3 Steps to reproduce the problem: create new nopcommerce database from its normal installation procedure, then enter the admin are, then change the language to arabic, then try to create a product. the product will not save, and any other page that has a numeric field will not save. ![nopCommerce-adding-product](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12806275/124443631-844e1d00-dd86-11eb-8182-bd43d1a6eaf7.png)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #5756 Fixed kendoNumericTextBox default options for Arabic languages
